title: Data Management Plan
text: Consulting on Data Management Plan and <a href='./#/about/dmp'>template on EnviDat<a>.

title: GitLab on WSL
text: Technical consulting about the GitLab usage on WSL (it allows collaboration with external partners).

title: EnviDat at your Service
text: Consulting and support on publishing research data with DOIs on EnviDat.

title: HPC on WSL
text: WSL's Hyperion High-Performance Computing (HPC) Linux Cluster (only available inside the WSL Intranet).

title: Interactive Jupyter Hub
text: JupyterLab/JupyterHub interactive development environment to combine documentation, code and data (only available inside the WSL Intranet).
